Composer Steve Dancz of the University of Georgia, top left, with lead trumpet player Chuck Arnold and assistant composer Ben Leathers. Dancz composed "Declaration Anthem," a score for the patriotic short film, The Declaration of Independence, that FOX will show seven minutes before Super Bowl XLV kicks off in Dallas.
